ComicInfo.Summary:
Witchblade's first milestone issue becomes the next classic art edition as Top Cow is pleased to offer you Michael Turner's last fully drawn issue of Witchblade in black and white format. Follow Sara as she strives to stop Nottingham and obtain back the one thing she never wanted to have in the first place, the Witchblade! Complimented with the mesmerizing artwork of Michael Turner and D-Tron, this fantastic issue is not to be missed!
